Uses of Package
br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.object2d

  • Packages that use br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.object2d 
    Package Description
    br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.object2d
    This package contains the visual components of the game, including cards, energy/life bars and the map, for example.
    br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.screens
    The visual layer (interfaces).
    br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.scripts
    The scripts are classes which specify the behavior of cards in battles.
  • Classes in br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.object2d used by br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.object2d 
    Class and Description
    FixedObject
    Abstract class inherited by all fixed objects on the screen, that is, the objects which remain on the same horizontal position relative to the camera.
  • Classes in br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.object2d used by br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.screens 
    Class and Description
    BackCard
    Visual representation of a card when it's placed on the field turned down.
    Deck2D
    A visual representation of the player deck.
    EnergyBar
    A visual representation of the player energy.
    FixedImage 
    FixedLabel 
    HandBackground
    Represents the background of the player's hand on the screen.
    Hexagram
    A Hexagram object is shown when the human player selects a card, in order to inform him where it's possible to place his cards.
    LifeBar
    A visual representation of the player/enemy current life.
    Map2D
    A visual representation of the map.
    MenuButton
    The pause button.
    Timer2D
    A visual representation of the remaining time of the current match.
    TransitionControl
    A TransitionControl object is an arrow pointing either to the right or left, moving the camera to the specified direction in a BattleScreen.
  • Classes in br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.object2d used by br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.scripts 
    Class and Description
    Fighter2D
    A representation of an fighter on the field.
